name: Artifex Technology Consulting, Inc. (Out of Business)
description:
Artifex Technology Consulting of Lincoln, Rhode Island, is a full-service development / design firm and Microsoft Certified Partner, with WBENC/WBE/DBE certifications. Although we hail from the smallest state, we bring the biggest ideas and talent to each project.
From websites and mobile apps to database architecture and application development, there is no challenge too large for our dedicated team of expert Microsoft certified developers, Zend certified developers, information architects, and UI and design specialists.Â
